title: I created an animated PROJECT: Zed Login screen!
body: Thank you for watching and tell me if you like it ! :D

replies.body: I think it's really cool as is. I like how it's not too much detail, i think it's good cause it's easy to look at the main piece, Project Zed himself

good job ! I have a proposition to make it even better : first off, just show the background, with robots and then zed's shadows appear, and zed swap position with it to take the same position as in the splash art. and then show some animations of the lucians' missiles killing the robot :D
You should give the sparks in the background some effects me thinks, and Lucian's plasma bolt as well.
